content: create this beautiful textured headband the pattern features a lot of texture and is so much fun to make this pattern is for an adult size 21-23 head circumference measures approx 4 wide materials - h hook 5 00 mm - medium worsted weight yarn i used hobby lobby s i love this yarn in light gray - large button about 1 1/4″ - tapestry needle you will need to know how to - single_crochet - double_crochet - front post double_crochet - decreasing
